B.Description: Lose fat whilst maintaining muscle OR Build Muscle whilst gaining weight (cardio and nutrition should be focused on separately)

P.Description: Gain strength in the 3 powerlifts (squat, bench press, deadlift) whilst not focusing on any changes in body composition.

H.Description: Enhance overall health via weightlifting (cardio should be incorporated separately)

A.Description: Focus on sport-specific training to improve performance in a particular sport. Actual training for the given sport should be designed by your coach.
